text: Yuki Bhambri was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Henri Laaksonen won the title after defeating Jason Jung 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Shanghai Challenger - Singles 2016 Singles Category:2016 in Chinese sport
title: 2016 Shanghai Challenger – Singles
